problem_text_cn: 如图,一个高为1m的油筒内有油,一根木棒长1.2m,从桶盖小口斜插入桶内,一端到底部,另一端正好到小口,抽出木棒,量得棒上浸油部分的长0.36m,则桶内油的高度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, an oil cylinder with a height of N_0 contains oil, and the length of a wooden stick is N_1. Insert it obliquely into the barrel from the small opening of the lid. One end to the bottom, and the other end just to the small opening. Pull out the wooden stick, after measurement, get the length of the oil-immersed part on the rod N_2, the height of the oil in the barrel is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示:∵DE∥CB,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{DA}{AB},∵AC=1m,AB=1.2m,BD=0.36m,∴\frac{1-EC}{1}=\frac{1.2-0.36}{1.2},解得:EC=0.3,即桶内油的高度为:0.3m．故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的应用,根据题意得出相似三角形是解题关键．
